# OneIdentity Security Monitoring Dashboard
---
This workbook monitors OneIdentity password management activities and identifies potential security risks including bulk password requests, privilege escalation attempts, and anomalous user behavior.

content.query:
// Enhanced bulk password request detection with risk scoring
let timeWindow = totimespan('{TimeRange:grain}');
let minPasswordCount = toint('{MinPasswordCount}');
let maxTimeSpan = totimespan(strcat('{MaxTimeSpan}', 'm'));
let businessHoursStart = 7;
let businessHoursEnd = 19;
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeWindow)
| where DeviceVendor == "OneIdentity"
| where Activity in ("AccessRequestCreated", "PasswordReleased")
| where isnotempty(DestinationUserName) and isnotempty(DeviceCustomString1)
| extend UPN = replace_string(strcat(DestinationUserName, "@", coalesce(DestinationDnsDomain, "")), 'ad.capita.co.uk', 'capita.co.uk')
| extend RequestAccount = strcat(coalesce(DeviceCustomString1, ""), "@", coalesce(DeviceCustomString2, ""))
| extend HourOfDay = hourofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend IsBusinessHours = HourOfDay >= businessHoursStart and HourOfDay <= businessHoursEnd
| extend IsPrivileged = RequestAccount has_any ("admin", "service", "privileged", "root", "sa")
| summarize 
    RequestedPasswords = countif(Activity == "AccessRequestCreated"),
    ReleasedPasswords = countif(Activity == "PasswordReleased"),
    ReleasedAccounts = make_set_if(RequestAccount, Activity == "PasswordReleased"),
    PrivilegedRequests = countif(Activity == "AccessRequestCreated" and IsPrivileged),
    OffHoursRequests = countif(Activity == "AccessRequestCreated" and not(IsBusinessHours)),
    EarliestEvent = min(TimeGenerated),
    LatestEvent = max(TimeGenerated),
    UniqueAccounts = dcount(RequestAccount)
    by UPN
| extend TimeSpan = LatestEvent - EarliestEvent
| extend RiskScore = 
    case(
        RequestedPasswords >= 20, 5,
        RequestedPasswords >= 15, 4,
        RequestedPasswords >= 10, 3,
        RequestedPasswords >= minPasswordCount and TimeSpan <= maxTimeSpan, 2,
        1
    ) + 
    case(
        PrivilegedRequests > 0, 2,
        0
    ) +
    case(
        OffHoursRequests > (RequestedPasswords * 0.5), 1,
        0
    )
| extend RiskLevel = 
    case(
        RiskScore >= 7, "Critical",
        RiskScore >= 5, "High", 
        RiskScore >= 3, "Medium",
        "Low"
    )
| where RequestedPasswords >= minPasswordCount and ReleasedPasswords >= minPasswordCount
| where TimeSpan <= maxTimeSpan or RequestedPasswords >= 10
| project UPN, RequestedPasswords, ReleasedPasswords, PrivilegedRequests, OffHoursRequests, UniqueAccounts, ReleasedAccounts, EarliestEvent, LatestEvent, TimeSpan, RiskScore, RiskLevel
| order by RiskScore desc, ReleasedPasswords desc
content.title: ðŸš¨ High-Risk Password Access Patterns

content.query:
// Password request timeline with risk indicators
let timeWindow = totimespan('{TimeRange:grain}');
CommonSecurityLog
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeWindow)
| where DeviceVendor == "OneIdentity"
| where Activity in ("AccessRequestCreated", "PasswordReleased")
| extend UPN = replace_string(strcat(DestinationUserName, "@", coalesce(DestinationDnsDomain, "")), 'ad.domain.co.uk', 'domain.co.uk')
| extend RequestAccount = strcat(coalesce(DeviceCustomString1, ""), "@", coalesce(DeviceCustomString2, ""))
| extend IsPrivileged = RequestAccount has_any ("admin", "service", "privileged", "root", "sa")
| extend HourOfDay = hourofday(TimeGenerated)
| extend IsBusinessHours = HourOfDay >= 7 and HourOfDay <= 19
| summarize 
    Events = count(),
    PrivilegedEvents = countif(IsPrivileged),
    OffHoursEvents = countif(not(IsBusinessHours))
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Activity
| extend RiskIndicator = PrivilegedEvents + OffHoursEvents
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, Events, RiskIndicator
| render timechart
content.title: ðŸ“Š Password Activity Timeline

content.query:
// Enhanced password check failures with context
let timeWindow = totimespan('{TimeRange:grain}');
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "OneIdentity" 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeWindow) 
| where Activity == "PasswordCheckFailed"
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomString1)
| extend DomainAccount = DeviceCustomString1
| extend Domain = coalesce(DeviceCustomString2, "Unknown")
| extend Details = coalesce(DeviceCustomString5, "No details")
| extend IsPrivileged = DomainAccount has_any ("admin", "service", "privileged", "root", "sa")
| summarize 
    FailureCount = count(),
    LatestFailure = max(TimeGenerated),
    UniqueDetails = make_set(Details),
    IsPrivilegedAccount = max(toint(IsPrivileged))
    by DomainAccount, Domain
| extend RiskLevel = 
    case(
        FailureCount >= 10 and IsPrivilegedAccount == 1, "Critical",
        FailureCount >= 5 and IsPrivilegedAccount == 1, "High",
        FailureCount >= 10, "Medium",
        "Low"
    )
| project DomainAccount, Domain, FailureCount, LatestFailure, RiskLevel, UniqueDetails
| order by FailureCount desc
content.title: âŒ Password Authentication Failures

content.query:
// Enhanced directory sync monitoring with trend analysis
let timeWindow = totimespan('{TimeRange:grain}');
let currentPeriod = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "OneIdentity"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeWindow)
| where Activity contains "DirectoryAssetSyncFailed"
| summarize CurrentFailures = count() by Domain = coalesce(DeviceCustomString1, "Unknown");
let previousPeriod = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "OneIdentity" 
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(timeWindow * 2) .. ago(timeWindow))
| where Activity contains "DirectoryAssetSyncFailed"
| summarize PreviousFailures = count() by Domain = coalesce(DeviceCustomString1, "Unknown");
currentPeriod
| join kind=fullouter previousPeriod on Domain
| extend Domain = coalesce(Domain, Domain1)
| extend CurrentFailures = coalesce(CurrentFailures, 0)
| extend PreviousFailures = coalesce(PreviousFailures, 0)
| extend TrendPercentage = 
    case(
        PreviousFailures == 0 and CurrentFailures > 0, 100.0,
        PreviousFailures == 0, 0.0,
        round(((CurrentFailures - PreviousFailures) * 100.0 / PreviousFailures), 1)
    )
| extend Trend = 
    case(
        TrendPercentage > 50, "ðŸ“ˆ Significant Increase",
        TrendPercentage > 0, "ðŸ“Š Increase", 
        TrendPercentage < -50, "ðŸ“‰ Significant Decrease",
        TrendPercentage < 0, "ðŸ“Š Decrease",
        "âž¡ï¸ Stable"
    )
| extend AlertLevel = 
    case(
        CurrentFailures >= 50, "Critical",
        CurrentFailures >= 20, "High",
        CurrentFailures >= 5, "Medium",
        "Low"
    )
| project Domain, CurrentFailures, PreviousFailures, TrendPercentage, Trend, AlertLevel
| order by CurrentFailures desc
content.title: ðŸ”„ Directory Sync Health & Trends

content.query:
// Enhanced user deletion monitoring with context
let timeWindow = totimespan('{TimeRange:grain}');
let deletedUsers = CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor == "OneIdentity" 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeWindow) 
| where Activity == "UserDeleted"
| where isnotempty(DeviceCustomString3)
| project DeletedAccount = DeviceCustomString3, DeletionTime = TimeGenerated, Activity;

let userDetails = IdentityInfo
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeWindow * 2)
| where AccountName in ((deletedUsers | project DeletedAccount))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by AccountName
| project AccountName, AccountDisplayName, Manager, Department, JobTitle;

deletedUsers
| join kind=leftouter userDetails on $left.DeletedAccount == $right.AccountName
| extend RiskLevel = 
    case(
        JobTitle has_any ("admin", "manager", "director", "executive", "privileged"), "High",
        isnotempty(Manager), "Medium",
        "Low"
    )
| project 
    DeletedAccount, 
    DeletionTime, 
    AccountDisplayName = coalesce(AccountDisplayName, "Unknown"),
    Manager = coalesce(Manager, "Unknown"),
    Department = coalesce(Department, "Unknown"),
    JobTitle = coalesce(JobTitle, "Unknown"),
    RiskLevel
| order by DeletionTime desc
content.title: ðŸ‘¤ User Account Deletions

content.query:
// Enhanced breakglass account monitoring
let timeWindow = totimespan('{TimeRange:grain}');
let breakglassKeywords = dynamic(["breakglass", "emergency", "yootha", "bga", "emrg"]);

IdentityDirectoryEvents
| where TimeGenerated > ago(timeWindow)
| where TargetAccountDisplayName has_any (breakglassKeywords) or
       TargetAccountUpn has_any (breakglassKeywords) or
       AccountDisplayName has_any (breakglassKeywords)
| where isnotempty(TargetAccountDisplayName) or isnotempty(TargetAccountUpn) or isnotempty(AccountDisplayName)
| extend
   AccountType =
       case(
           TargetAccountDisplayName has_any (breakglassKeywords), "Target",
           AccountDisplayName has_any (breakglassKeywords), "Initiator",
           "Related"
       ),
   RiskScore =
       case(
           ActionType in ("Add member to role", "Remove member from role", "Update user"), 5,
           ActionType in ("User logged in", "Sign-in activity"), 3,
           ActionType == "Password changed", 4,
           1
       ),
   HourOfDay = hourofday(TimeGenerated),
   IsBusinessHours = hourofday(TimeGenerated) >= 7 and hourofday(TimeGenerated) <= 19
| extend AlertLevel =
   case(
       RiskScore >= 4 and not(IsBusinessHours), "Critical",
       RiskScore >= 4, "High",
       RiskScore >= 3, "Medium",
       "Low"
   )
| extend BreakglassAccount = 
   case(
       TargetAccountDisplayName has_any (breakglassKeywords), TargetAccountDisplayName,
       TargetAccountUpn has_any (breakglassKeywords), TargetAccountUpn,
       AccountDisplayName has_any (breakglassKeywords), AccountDisplayName,
       "Unknown"
   )
| where BreakglassAccount != "Unknown"
| project
   TimeGenerated,
   BreakglassAccount,
   ActionType,
   TargetAccount = coalesce(TargetAccountDisplayName, TargetAccountUpn, "Unknown"),
   InitiatedBy = coalesce(AccountDisplayName, "System"),
   AccountType,
   RiskScore,
   AlertLevel,
   IsBusinessHours,
   Location,
   IPAddress
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: ðŸš¨ Breakglass & Emergency Account Activity
